title: Reference
body:
Reference¶

Notification¶

Notifications are generated by Maha every time something happens that requires your attention. You can configure which notifications you wish to receive for each app and how you wish to receive them.

Profile¶

A profile is a link to a 3rd party application provider such as Google, MailChimp, Facebook, or Adobe Sign. You can connect and disconnect these profiles at any time and they are connect to your account, so they will be available to you no matter which team your are currently accessing.
